-------- ursprã¼ngliche nachricht --------
von: karatektus <notifications@github.com> 
datum:  
an: owncloud/core <core@noreply.github.com> 
betreff: [core] [feature request] external storage: use s3 clones (f.e. walruss, riak-cs) (#4779) 
 
hi,

we wanted to deploy owncloud for our customers. since owncloud has support for external storage we wanted to use riak-cs, which is open source and has an s3 api. sadly, owncloud only supports amazons own s3 service. would it be possible to extend those capabilitys? since its the same api only the host would need to be changed, wouldn't it?

â€”
reply to this email directly or view it on github.
